# featureValue(for:)

**Instance Method**

Accesses the feature value given the feature’s name.

## Declaration

```swift
func featureValue(for featureName: String) -> MLFeatureValue?
```

## Parameters

- **featureName**: The name of the feature of the desired value.

## Return Value

The value of the feature, or nil if no value exists for that name.

## Accessing values

- **featureNames**: The set of valid feature names.

items.description: The set of valid feature names.
